Easy Slider jQuery Plugin
Multiple sliders

Usage

(function ($) {
    $(function () {
        $("#slider").easySlider({
            auto: true,
            continuous: true,
            nextId: "slider1next",
            prevId: "slider1prev"
        });
        $("#slider2").easySlider({
            numeric: true
        });
    });
})(jQuery);
